english_translation: If the mind is not mature, what difference does it make if someone corrects it?

kannada_original: ನೀ ನಿನ್ನ ಅರಿಯಲಿಕೆ ನೀನೆ ಗುರು ನಿನಗೆ !
english_transliteration: Nī ninna ariyalike nīne guru ninage !
english_translation: To know yourself, you are your own teacher!
When water rises from the earth and becomes vapor, it is a cloud.
In the world, awareness is the teacher – Dear Rāma.
